issue.steps_to_reproduce: - Create a new document - Select a black background - Switch to desktop mode - Change color of the pen You can choose white. red, blue and green In fact it's the others colors black, dark red, dark blue, dark green

issue.summary: Using backspace in a text box when it's grouped with an other object, the group disappear.

issue.steps_to_reproduce: - Create a text box with text in it - Create a other object - Group the 2 objects - Edit the text - Erase a letter with backspace the group disappear

issue.summary: Add a page from another document to the actual document doesn't add anything
issue.description: When the user tries to add a page from another document to the current one, it comes back to the Board mode without adding the selected page.
issue.steps_to_reproduce: - Launch OpenBoard - Go to Document mode - Select a page from another document - Click on Add to current document --> the page is not added
issue.additional_information: It is like this all the time, BUT, when the user double-clicks on the current document current page, then it will work correctly all the time.

issue.summary: Images, sounds, videos deleted can be found in folder OB documents
issue.description: Images, sounds, videos deleted can be found in folder OB documents and even more, new folder appears in OB folder in /Application Support/Documents
issue.steps_to_reproduce:
Open OB - write 1 in page 1 with pen - drag a sound in page 2 - drag a video in page 3 - drag a picture in page 4 - write 5 in page 5 - go to mode Documents, name the document as Test medias ; duplicate Test medias to Test medias 2 Close OB Go in the OB folder (in Application Support), Documents --> there is 2 OB folders Open OB - go to document Test medias - from the Document mode, delete page 2, 3 and 4 Close OB Go in the OB folder --> the folder corresponding to Test Medias has always a folder images which contains the image of the page 4. First bug
Open OB - go to document Test medias 2 - go to page 2, delete the sound, go to page 3, delete the video, go to page 4, delete the image Close OB Go in the OB folder --> the folder corresponding to Test Medias 2 contains always the folders images, videos, audios which contain the media used in pages 2, 3, 4. Second big bug.
I look in this folder and i see that the thumbnail and svg of the last page (5) was blank. So i open again OB, go to Test Medias 2 and create a page 6 with a number 6 writed with pen. - i go again in OB folder and i have no more 2 folders, one for Test Medias, one for Test Medias 2, but 3 folders. Folder 1 corresponds to Test Medias and contains folder images, but folders 2 and 3 contain the 3 folders of medias. The difference is that folder 2 contains thumbnail and svg for 1 page, but folder 3 contain thumbnail and svg for 6 pages (but no thumnail for page 000. Third big bug
issue.additional_information:
OpenBoard Document 2013-07-04 14-10-44.660 corresponds to Test Medias
OpenBoard Document 2013-07-04 14-09-43.259 corresponds to Test Medias 2, this folder contains only thumbail and svg for one page.
OpenBoard Document 2013-07-04 14-08-37.626 corresponds to Test Medias 2, this folder contains thumbail and svg for 6 pages (but no thumbnail for page 0).
